## Setup

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
example_df <- data.frame(Entity = paste("e", seq(1001, 3000), sep="_"))

for(cl in paste("cat", seq(1000, 1050), sep="_")){
  example_df[[cl]] <- sample(c(0, 1), 2000, replace=TRUE)
}

example_df <- tibble::column_to_rownames(example_df, "Entity")

head(example_df)
```
